original_text: Hymenaeus and Alexander are people like that. I have given them to Satan so that he may punish them. Then they will learn not to say bad things against God any more.
korean_text: 그 가운데 후메내오와 알렉산더가 있으니 내가 사탄에게 내준 것은 그들로 훈계를 받아 신성을 모독하지 못하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Hymenaeus and Alexander are people like that.
I have given them to Satan
so that he may punish them.
not to say bad things against God any more.
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 하나님을 거슬러 나쁜 말을 하지 않도록 말입니다.
